meanings.sent1: Family reunions are filled with cousinages, with everyone catching up and sharing stories.
meanings.sent2: I have a close cousinages with my cousin Sarah; we grew up together and are like siblings.
meanings.sent3: At the family picnic, the cousinages were all playing games and laughing together.
meanings.sent4: The cousinages in our family tree branch out far and wide, connecting us in unexpected ways.
meanings.sent5: The bond of cousinages is special, as cousins can be both friends and family at the same time.

meanings.sent1: Our cousinages began when our parents got married and we became family.

meanings.definition: The collective cousins in a family.
meanings.sent1: During family gatherings, the cousinages always have a great time playing games and chatting.
meanings.sent2: The cousinages in our family range from toddlers to grandparents, creating a diverse group.
